Package controller

Class Customers

java.lang.Object
controller.Customers
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Customers extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the Customer GUI of the application.

This class is responsible for handling all user interactions on the Customer GUI, including initializing the Customer table. The TableView contains a column which has a three dot button that was added programmatically to the table.

    • onAddCustomer

      public void onAddCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action triggered by the 'Add Customer' button. This method loads the customer addition form into the central pane of the main application window.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the button click.
